mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CALENDAR JOIN CALENDAR_USER ON CALENDAR.ID = CALENDAR_USER.calendarId WHERE employeeId = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR(id, title, color) VALUES (CALENDAR_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{color})
mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET title = #{title}, color = #{color} WHERE id = ${id}
